quote: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded. – Ralph Waldo Emerson
fact: When we think of Big Ben in London, we think of the clock. Actually, it's the bell.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Man, I really love my furniture... me and my recliner go way back.
